Detailed Description

This class updates the FileHeader of an existing file with new information.

FileHeader &  updateHdr,
FileHeader &  currentHdr 
)

Update the file with new FileHeader information

Parameters:
os An output stream open with std::ios::out|stdios::binary|stdios::in.
updateHdr A FileHeader with information to update the file.
currentHdr A FileHeader with information current in the file.
Returns:
Returns true if successful.
